Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b9pre) Gecko/20110105 Firefox/4.0b9pre

Session restore does not show the correct list of tabs to restore after several abnormal exits. (Litmus testcase 10260)


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Start Firefox
2.Open a couple of windows with a few tabs each with different pages loaded
3.Resize and relocate the windows
4.Kill Firefox
5.Start Firefox
6.If the Restore Session error page appears, restore your session
7.Kill Firefox again
8.Start Firefox
9.Click the Home button
10.Kill Firefox again
11.Start Firefox

Actual Results:  
After killing Firefox a third time the list of tabs from previous session is displayed (not the home tab).


Expected Results:  
After killing Firefox a third time a single tab with the homepage is present in your restore window.
comments.creator: george.carstoiu@gmail.com
